questions.text: What does Deion ask Kate to do?
questions.explanation:
Move the wedding date up.

	Deion is played by Cuba Gooding, Jr. and is Norbit's rival for Kate's affection. Deion is also secretly in cahoots with the Latimores to turn the orphanage into a strip joint!

questions.text: What do the Latimore brothers officially do for a living?
questions.explanation:
They run a construction business.

	The three Latimore brothers run a construction business, and also indulge in some illegal activity on the side. There are three brothers who are muscular, and keep Norbit in line.

Pope Sweet Jesus.

	Pope Sweet Jesus is a gangster who is often seen with his friend  Lord Have Mercy. Pope Sweet Jesus holds up Kate and Deion's wedding by having the choir sing and showing off some flashy dance moves.

questions.text: Rasputia runs over a dog. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Lloyd.

	After his fateful encounter with Rasputia's car, Lloyd walks around, thanks to two wheels where his back legs should be. He urges Norbit to get rid of Rasputia, and is voiced by Charles Murphy, Eddie's brother.

questions.text: What pet did baby Norbit have?
questions.explanation:
A duck.

	Norbit had a pet duck until Mr. Wong took it from Norbit and beheaded it for his Chinese diner. Norbit wasn't too happy about that.

questions.text: Where did the snake bite Norbit?
questions.explanation:
On his behind.

	When Norbit and Rasputia get married, Mr. Wong recounts this story, telling about how Norbit survived the snake's terrible venom even though he received no medical attention.

questions.text: What does Buster call Rasputia during dance class?
questions.explanation:
A pumpkin.

	Buster is Rasputia's dance teacher. When Rasputia wears orange to her dance class, Buster calls her a pumpkin.

questions.text: What is Mr. Wong's favorite hobby?
questions.explanation:
Whaling.

	Mr. Wong's interest in whaling comes in handy at the end of the movie, when Rasputia and her brothers are driven away.

questions.text: Where do the Latimore's end up at the end of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Mexico.

	The four siblings finally get to open their illicit business in Mexico, after the townspeople drive them away. Rasputia is described as their most skilled worker.

questions.text: Instead of making dinner for Kate, Deion buys cheap take-out food.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Deion fools Kate into thinking he made dinner for her, but he really just bought inexpensive take-out food. Kate tells Norbit that Deion is a horrible cook as a result.
